languages.text: "Мой путь не должен оборваться здесь. Я уже {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}пожертвовала многим{/d} — и новая цена... я cмогу ее заплатить. Дети Крудараха заслуживают, чтобы скорбная песнь о судьбе нашего дома разлилась сквозь века. Чтобы выбраться из этого места и познать истину о случившемся... я это сделаю".

"My path must not end here. I have already {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}sacrificed much{/d}, and this new price... is one I can pay. The children of Crudarach deserve to have the mournful song about the fate of our home flow through the ages. If it means escaping this place so I can learn the truth... I will do it."
languages.original_text: "Мой путь не должен оборваться здесь. Я уже {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}пожертвовала многим{/d} — и новая цена... я cмогу ее заплатить. Дети Крудараха заслуживают, чтобы скорбная песнь о судьбе нашего дома разлилась сквозь века. Чтобы выбраться из этого места и познать истину о случившемся... я это сделаю".

The children of Crudarach deserve to have the mournful song about the fate of our home flow through the ages. If it means escaping this place so I can learn the truth... I will do it."

"My path must not end here. I have already sacrificed much, and this new price... is one I can pay. The children of Crudarach deserve to have the mournful song about the fate of our home flow through the ages. If it means escaping this place so I can learn the truth... I will do it."

"My path must not end here. I have already {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}sacrificed much{/d}, and this new price... is one I can pay. The children of Crudarach deserve to have the mournful song about the fate of our home flow through the ages. If it means escaping this place so I can learn the truth... I will do it."

languages.text: 「私の道はここで終わってはならない。これまでも、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}多くの犠牲を払ってきた{/d}。そしてこの新たな代価は…私の払うことのできるものだ。クルダラの子らは、我らの故郷の命運を紡ぐ嘆きの歌を、時代を超えて歌い継ぐにふさわしいこの地を脱出することが真実を知ることを意味するならば…私はこの身を捧げよう」
languages.original_text: "My path must not end here. I have already {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}sacrificed much{/d}, and this new price... is one I can pay. The children of Crudarach deserve to have the mournful song about the fate of our home flow through the ages. If it means escaping this place so I can learn the truth... I will do it."

traits.locale_text: 「私の道はここで終わってはならない。これまでも、多くの犠牲を払ってきた。そしてこの新たな代価は…私の払うことのできるものだ。クルダラの子らは、我らの故郷の命運を紡ぐ嘆きの歌を、時代を超えて歌い継ぐにふさわしいこの地を脱出することが真実を知ることを意味するならば…私はこの身を捧げよう」

languages.text: “我的道途不能就此结束。我已经{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}付出了很多牺牲{/d}，而这新的代价……我也支付得起。克鲁达拉赫的子嗣需要知道真相，需要聆听这首关于家园的哀伤之歌。如果这么做可以帮助我们逃离这个地方，让我了解真相……那我愿意这么做。”
languages.original_text: "My path must not end here. I have already {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}sacrificed much{/d}, and this new price... is one I can pay. The children of Crudarach deserve to have the mournful song about the fate of our home flow through the ages. If it means escaping this place so I can learn the truth... I will do it."

traits.locale_text: “我的道途不能就此结束。我已经付出了很多牺牲，而这新的代价……我也支付得起。克鲁达拉赫的子嗣需要知道真相，需要聆听这首关于家园的哀伤之歌。如果这么做可以帮助我们逃离这个地方，让我了解真相……那我愿意这么做。”

languages.text: « Ma Voie ne doit pas s'arrêter là. J'ai déjà {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}tant sacrifié{/d} et c'est là un prix... que je peux payer. Les enfants de Crudarach méritent que l'ode au destin de notre foyer traverse les âges. S'il faut pour cela s'échapper de cet endroit pour découvrir la vérité... C'est ce que je ferai. »
languages.original_text: "My path must not end here. I have already {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}sacrificed much{/d}, and this new price... is one I can pay. The children of Crudarach deserve to have the mournful song about the fate of our home flow through the ages. If it means escaping this place so I can learn the truth... I will do it."

traits.locale_text: « Ma Voie ne doit pas s'arrêter là. J'ai déjà tant sacrifié et c'est là un prix... que je peux payer. Les enfants de Crudarach méritent que l'ode au destin de notre foyer traverse les âges. S'il faut pour cela s'échapper de cet endroit pour découvrir la vérité... C'est ce que je ferai. »

languages.text: «Mi senda no debe terminar aquí. Ya he {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}sacrificado mucho{/d}, y este precio... es algo que puedo permitirme. Los hijos de Crudarach merecen que la canción fúnebre del destino de nuestro mundo natal fluya a través de los tiempos. Si debo escapar de aquí para descubrir la verdad... lo haré».
languages.original_text: "My path must not end here. I have already {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}sacrificed much{/d}, and this new price... is one I can pay. The children of Crudarach deserve to have the mournful song about the fate of our home flow through the ages. If it means escaping this place so I can learn the truth... I will do it."

traits.locale_text: «Mi senda no debe terminar aquí. Ya he sacrificado mucho, y este precio... es algo que puedo permitirme. Los hijos de Crudarach merecen que la canción fúnebre del destino de nuestro mundo natal fluya a través de los tiempos. Si debo escapar de aquí para descubrir la verdad... lo haré».

languages.text: "Mein Pfad darf hier nicht enden. Ich habe schon so {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}viel geopfert{/d} und diesen neuen Preis ... kann ich bezahlen. Die Kinder von Crudarach verdienen es, dass das traurige Lied über das Schicksal unserer Heimat die Zeiten überdauert. Wenn es heißt, ich entkomme von diesem Ort, um die Wahrheit zu erfahren ... Ich werde es tun."
languages.original_text: "My path must not end here. I have already {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}sacrificed much{/d}, and this new price... is one I can pay. The children of Crudarach deserve to have the mournful song about the fate of our home flow through the ages. If it means escaping this place so I can learn the truth... I will do it."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Pfad darf hier nicht enden. Ich habe schon so viel geopfert und diesen neuen Preis ... kann ich bezahlen. Die Kinder von Crudarach verdienen es, dass das traurige Lied über das Schicksal unserer Heimat die Zeiten überdauert. Wenn es heißt, ich entkomme von diesem Ort, um die Wahrheit zu erfahren ... Ich werde es tun."

languages.text: "Yolum burada sonlanmamalı. Şimdiye değin zaten çok {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}fedakârlıkta bulundum{/d} ve bu yeni bedel de... Ödeyebileceğim bir bedel. Crudarach'ın çocukları, yuvamızın kaderi hakkındaki matemli şarkının çağlar boyunca akıp yoluna devam etmesini hak ediyor. Eğer bu yerden kaçıp, gerçeği öğrenmem anlamına gelecekse, bunu yapacağım."
languages.original_text: "My path must not end here. I have already {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}sacrificed much{/d}, and this new price... is one I can pay. The children of Crudarach deserve to have the mournful song about the fate of our home flow through the ages. If it means escaping this place so I can learn the truth... I will do it."

traits.locale_text: "Yolum burada sonlanmamalı. Şimdiye değin zaten çok {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_Yrliet_BrokenPromise}fedakârlıkta bulundum{/d} ve bu yeni bedel de... Ödeyebileceğim bir bedel. Crudarach'ın çocukları, yuvamızın kaderi hakkındaki matemli şarkının çağlar boyunca akıp yoluna devam etmesini hak ediyor. Eğer bu yerden kaçıp, gerçeği öğrenmem anlamına gelecekse, bunu yapacağım."
